value.name: ‘Pervasive sexual favoritism’ rampant at Redlands PD, suit alleges
value.description: A Redlands police detective with more than 20 years ... Martinez and Falconieri both accuse Officer Eddie Herrera, who they claim has a history of complaints against him, of sexual harassment ...

value.name: 2 West Valley men charged with raping woman
value.description: Eddie Herrera Derbyshire, 22 ... a class B misdemeanor. On Sept. 27, police say Hernandez, Derbyshire and a third unknown man picked the woman up to drive her to street races.
